name: Developer
description: This role allow the user to interact with the platform, add text to the histories and make minimal changes to the user stories

name: Product Owner
description: This role allow the user to create new elements, change time estimations, assign and modify roles into the platform.

name: Tester
description: With this role, the user can create, update and erase test cases.

name: Administrator
description: This role provides full control over the platform
